optedOutNotificationSourceTypes.description: List of strings to specify the opted out notification source types

optedOutReceiverDestinationTypes.description: List of strings to specify the opted out receiver destination types

receiverDestinationType.description: Type of the destination of the notification

isSetByReceiver.description: Is the corresponding notification set by the receiver

pushNotificationDestinationPreferences.description: List of models that specify the different preferences of push notification destinations for the user

platform.description: Platform corresponding to the destination setting

isEnabled.description: Is the notification for the corresponding destination enabled

isSetByReceiver.description: Is the notification for the corresponding destination set by the receiver

rollOutFeatureEnabledList.description: List of models to specify feature and corresponding enable/disable pairs

featureName.description:
Name of the rollout feature
Valid Feature Names : "PushNotifications" / "NotificationStream" / "NativeSignalR"

isValidFeature.description: Is the feature name specified a valid feature

updatedSettings.description: List of notification band settings model

isEnabled.description: Is Notification enabled for tje destination

destinationType.description: Type of notification receiver destination type

id.description: Id of the notification stream entry

eventDate.description: Datetime when the notification stream entry event had occured

isInteracted.description: Has the user interacted with the notification stream entry

metadataCollection.description: List of metadata objects showing more details related to the notification stream entry

eventCount.description: Count of events corresponding to the group of notification stream entry

eventId.description: Event Id to be marked interacted

unreadNotifications.description: Count of unread notifications in the stream

hasUserInteractedWithNotificationStream.description: Has user interacted with the notification stream

showNotificationStreamPrompt.description: Should the notification stream prompt be visible for the user

Roblox.Api.Notifications.Models.GameUpda.description: Model for a game update message to be displayed in notification stream.

createdOn.description: Creation date of the update message.

createdOnKey.description: Key of Creation date ticks (dynamo table sort key).

universeId.description: id of the universe whose notification was interacted with

createdOn.description: Date time string of the created on date of the notification formatted as unix timestamp

currentUserId.description: Id of the user that is being tracked

Roblox.Api.Notifications.Models.GameUpda.description: The request model for game update notification interacted event

universeId.description: id of the universe whose notification was interacted with

interactionType.description: type of interaction, current usage includes ["Seen", "Played", "Unfollowed"] in the future we will expand it to include other actions

currentUserId.description: Id of the user that is being tracked

destinations.description: List of destinations for the user push notification

userPushNotificationDestinationId.description: Destination Id for the push notification

application.description:
application for the corresponding notification
Example : "Roblox"

Roblox.Api.Notifications.Models.ChromeMa.description: Chrome Manifest to link GCM project to Chrome browser

initiatedByUser.description: Is the call initiated by user

userPushNotificationDestinationId.description: Id of the push notification destination

name.description: Name of the push Notification destination

initiatedByUser.description: Is the call initiated by the user

authorizeForUser.description: Is this call authorized for user

metadata.description: Metadata for the push notification client

notificationId.description: Id for the push client notification

type.description: Type of the push client notification

fallbackDelivered.description: Is fallback delivered for the notification metadata

platformType.description: Platform type sending the mark-as-read notification

notificationType.description: Type of notification to mark category as read

platformType.description: Type of platform making the request

interactionType.description: Type of interation with the notification
